thread.title: ONELAN and COMM-TEC Partner in GermanyTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: ONELAN and COMM-TEC Partner in GermanyTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: ONELAN and COMM-TEC Partner in GermanyTravelandtourworld.com
text:
ONELAN and COMM-TEC Partner in Germany Published on : Tuesday, September 8, 2015
“The agreement with ONELAN as one of the worldwide market leaders in Digital Signage bolsters COMM-TEC’s Digital Signage offerings. ONELAN fits perfectly into the COMM-TEC strategy to offer best-in-class solutions to our customers” says Carsten Steinecker, Managing Director of COMM- TEC. “We are very pleased to work with ONELAN especially because of its innovative software product portfolio, including a very powerful Content Management Solution, and the comprehensive and solid hardware product portfolio .”
“We want to strengthen our distribution in Germany and we believe that COMM-TEC’s proven track record and ambitious approach in the Digital Signage Business will drive the ONELAN presence in Germany to the next level. COMM-TEC also knows how to offer first class support to the customers” says Frank Trossen, Head of Sales Central & Northern Europe at ONELAN.
ONELAN is a global leader for digital signage and IPTV solutions. Headquartered in the UK, with sales and support offices in Germany, USA and China, the company has over 300 partners in 50 countries. With a solid foundation and long history of profitable growth the business has received numerous awards since its foundation in 2000. The company develops innovative solutions for all types of screen-based communications including retail, DOOH, corporate communications and hospitality.
ONELAN offers a range content management solutions and signage players to suit customer requirements. The Publisher is designed for small network solutions. The Enterprise Content Management Server (CMS) virtual appliance is ideally suited to larger networks with 10,000’s of players and allows a mix of player type to be managed.
In addition to the Net Top Box (NTB) ONELAN’s high reliability 24/7 solid state HD and 4k Linux appliance players, ONELAN provides play back solutions for Android, Samsung SSSP, and LG WebOS integrated displays.
Source:- ONELAN
